code: import axios from'axios';import'dotenv/config';export var login=function login(data){return{type:'LOGIN_USER',payload:axios({method:'POST',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/login",data:data})};};export var logout=function logout(){return{type:'LOGOUT_USER'};};export var getUser=function getUser(){return{type:'GET_USER',payload:axios({method:"GET",url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user"})};};export var postUser=function postUser(data){return{type:'POST_USER',payload:axios({method:"POST",url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/register",data:data})};};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(UserId){return{type:'DELETE_USER',payload:axios({method:'DELETE',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/".concat(UserId)})};};
